word_mean: 电灼疗法：由高频电流产生的电火花使活组织损坏，可以是直接的或间接的。直接电灼疗法是把具金属端的绝缘电灼电极接到高频仪器的单极上，使电火花撞击治疗区。间接电灼疗法时，病人以金属把直接连到单极上，而操作者以探查电极来完成电弧

sentence.Network_en: The doctor advised him to use fulguration to treat his ulcer.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生建议他采用电灼疗法治疗溃疡.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the curative effect of fulguration combining injection acuminata ( CA ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨尖锐湿疣 ( CA ) 电灼联合局部注射乌体林斯治疗的效果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (usually plural in the sense 'flashes of lightning'): from Latin fulguratio(n-) 'sheet lightning', from fulgur 'lightning'. Sense 1 dates from the early 20th cent
